name: Fairbank Summerfest 2025

location.name: Eglinton Ave W - west of Dufferin St

description:
A modern twist on a summer carnival extravaganza! With over 80,000 visitors last year, enjoy live performances, thrilling rides, and a sidewalk sale inspired by a bustling European bazaar. Treat your taste buds to a world of flavours with food from around the globe. 

Please email for questions and concerns.

name: 2025 Toronto Jazz Festival

location.name: Village of Yorkville Park - please see website for other locations

description:
Celebrating its 38th year with outdoor performances alongside ticketed shows featuring some of the best local and international jazz artists. 

Venues across the city will pulse with music, culture, and community. This year's festival promises unforgettable days of jazz in all its forms reflecting the depth and diversity of the genre and the rich cultural tapestry of the city itself.

name: Queer Wings: Sexual Diversity of Birds with May Matchim in High Park

location.name: High Park Nature Centre Forest School

description: Nature is fabulously queer! Start summer with May Matchim on a birding walk celebrating the incredible sexual diversity of birds from same-sex pair bonds to cooperative parenting and beyond! Discover how our feathered friends defy the binary and challenge human ideas about love and family. All are welcome – bring your binoculars (pairs will be available from the Nature Centre to borrow) and your pride!

name: Gay AF Comedy Pride-A-Palooza
description:
Serving up a cornucopia of Canada's top Queer comedic talent just in time for Pride!
The iconic Andrew Johnston from Bitch Salad, Video On Trial, Roast Battles, makes his triumphant return to our mainstage, headlining a fantastic show that will gear you up for celebrations.

Hosted by Canadian Comedy Award winner Robert Watson from OutTV, JFL, Zoofest and featuring Ajahnis Charley, Heather Mariko, Anasimone, Viza and more to be announced. Come join the funny!

name: Riverside Vintage Crawl - Summer Edition
description: Kick off the summer season and enjoy vintage shopping in stores and sidewalk sales. Complimentary snacks and refreshments available, and we pay the tax in-store. Local raffle prizes available!
